name: Bobby John's Survey
description:
Well Howdy! Welcome To Bobby John's Survey!

in This horror video game, All you gotta do is Do a simple survey, are you from the city or from the south?

In each level you must get 3 keys to unlock each lock, and get to the goal!

And well, Don't get jump scared by Bobby John and his friends!

This was also, my first game, so sorry if it sucks!

Thanks for viewing!
